name: Bling block
description:
The innovation of the gameplay in the classic game mode will definitely bring you a different game experience.

Gameplay:
1. There will be three tiles for you to choose to put into the board every round.
2. Drag the tiles, fill the entire row or column to eliminate them.
3. You can spin the given tiles by clicking on the prop.
4. You will fail when new tiles can't be put in the board.

Highlights:
There is no single way to enjoy your games!
No time limit!
Endless mode!

Challenge interesting levels, collect more stars and enjoy your brain time!
